learning_objectives.description: Integrate functions of the form: (ax + b)ⁿ for any rational n, sin(ax + b), cos(ax + b), sec²(ax + b), eᵃˣ⁺ᵇ. (Includes the case where n = –1. For trigonometric functions angles will always be in radians. Solutions for indefinite integrals should include an arbitrary constant.)
